paragraph1.title: Expertise
paragraph1.description: I am a Front-end spécialist with a strong taste foranimation and JavaScript. I took Le Wagon Bootcamp in Nantes, March 2020.

paragraph2.title: Experience
paragraph2.description: I made WordPress websites for the last two years, diving into performances, accessibility, security and SEO : good practices essential for longevity and search engine optimization.

paragraph3.title: History
paragraph3.description:
What's more, I've been SybR, a documentary family photographer for more than ten years.
It is my second career, after twelve years as an x-ray tecnician in emergency departments (and night shift !).

portfolio1.title: Sybr Lab
portfolio1.description: I like clean and smooth websites, where typography and design have an important place. Typography is set on a modular scale based on the Gold number, in reference to my photography career. This is a quite simple one-page that I made without any framework at first, with a Parcel bundle. Then, I migrated the website into Nuxt. Greensock library is powering animation, and i18n internationalization.

portfolio2.title: WSSA
portfolio2.description: I did a Front-end work on this application that shares competition results of the Word Slalom Skaters Association. Ranks are displayed with the Datatables Plugin in Ruby on Rails framework.

portfolio3.title: PhotographR
portfolio3.description: This is a project made in ten days during Le Wagon bootcamp : a customer relationship management for photographers. Watch it on YouTube, presented by Ophélie, project promoter.

paragraph.title: Front-end Developer
paragraph.description:
You are a Company, a Start-up, a Web Agency or a Developer and you need a Front-end developer :
I am available for Front-end assigments as a freelancer, and open to job offers.
